sql.query:
SELECT id, market_id, rest_id, category_id, prod_mark_id
FROM m_product
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.p_id}} */

SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */

SELECT mp.id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_occurance_id, mp.prod_name_en as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_en as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mr.shop_name_en as shop_name, (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id where rw.prod_id is not null),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review 
FROM m_product mp left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id) 
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id) 
WHERE mp.status = 1 AND mp.id != @p_id AND mp.market_id = @market_id AND (mp.prod_mark_id = @prod_mark_id OR mp.category_id = @category_id OR mp.rest_id = @rest_id) order by mp.id desc

SELECT mp.id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_occurance_id, mp.prod_name_bn as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_bn as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mr.shop_name_bn as shop_name, (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id where rw.prod_id is not null),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review 
FROM m_product mp left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id) 
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id) 
WHERE mp.status = 1 AND mp.id != @p_id AND mp.market_id = @market_id AND (mp.prod_mark_id = @prod_mark_id OR mp.category_id = @category_id OR mp.rest_id = @rest_id) order by mp.id desc
